actions.name: Tera Shell
actions.description: Effect: Connection - Tera Starstorm. While the user meets the [Intrepid 3/4] Condition, the user takes 50% less damage from Physical- and Special-Category Attacks. Upon leaving battle, the user returns to its Normal Forme.
